word: H1486 - גֹּורָל - gôwrâl - go-rawl' - Lot - பங்கு

sections.paragraph: a lot, a portion, recompense, retribution
Part(s) of speech: Noun Masculine / பெயர்ச்சொல் (ஆண்பால்)

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From an unused root meaning to be rough (as stone); properly a pebble, that is, a lot (small stones being used for that purpose); figuratively a portion or destiny (as if determined by lot): - lot.
Cognate: H1486, H1632
